sentence:
…it is my  intention to make the following motions to recommit the bill:

A motion to recommit the bill to the Committee on       Appropriations with instructions to report back to the Senate       with changes that include eliminating the rescission of       Migration and Refugee Assistance funds and International       Disaster Assistance funds, including…

…the committee.                               Rule 9--Treaties

(a) General.--The committee is the only committee of the       Senate with jurisdiction to review and report to the Senate       on treaties submitted by the President for Senate advice and       consent to ratification. Because the House of Representatives       has no role in the approval…
